snippet: The largest showing of fury in 11 days over President Viktor F. Yanukovich’s refusal to sign political and trade accords with the European Union came as signs of fissure emerged within the government.
abstract: Hundreds of thousands of Ukrainians, enraged by violent security crackdown, take to the streets demanding resignation of Pres Viktor F Yanukovich and a realignment away from Russia toward Europe; outpouring of fury follows Yanukovich's refusal to sign political and trade accords with the European Union, move that has divided his government and threatened his ability to retain power.
lead_paragraph: The largest showing of fury in 11 days over President Viktor F. Yanukovich’s refusal to sign political and trade accords with the European Union came as signs of fissure emerged within the government.

headline.main: Thousands Demand Resignation of Ukraine Leader
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Leader Called to Resign As Anger Swells
